alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 30 at 3:54PM MST until May 01 at 11:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM PDT /9 AM MST/ TO 11 PM PDT /11 PM MST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Arizona, southeast California, and southern Nevada. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 11 PM Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and result in brief power outages, driving may become hazardous for high profile vehicles, and periods of blowing dust could occur.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau
